title: Value of the leading merchandise exporters worldwide 2018 , by exporting nation
yAxis: Export value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Exporting nation in the x axis and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Export value in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Exporting nation China and lowest at Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
The highest Exporting nation China has 2188.0 more Export value in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Exporting nation in the x axis and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Exporting nation China has the highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars and Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has the lowest Export value in billion U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Exporting nation in the x axis and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Export value in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Exporting nation China and lowest at Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Exporting nation, and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in each Exporting nation on the y axis.
Exporting nation China has the highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars and Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has the lowest Export value in billion U.S. dollars.
The Export value in billion U.S. dollars of Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is 8.32% smaller than the maximum value at China.

The Exporting nation China has the highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars, followed by Extra-EU (28), and United States. Down to the Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia which is the lowest.
The Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has 3.18 times less Export value in billion U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Exporting nations, we get total 11748.0.
